dialogues.text: BAD LOGAN (X-24) carries Laura down the front steps, head toward the farm road. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: ON LOGAN'S BACK AS HE CLATTERS DOWN THE STAIRS, CHARLES'
dialogues.text: his arms, wrapped in a bloody quilt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 (Bad Logan) stops in the center of the road where --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 squints at them. Starts toward the lights with his quarry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan racing out the door with Charles. The pick up lies ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Rice leans forward, rapt, watching out the windshield like a proud father-- as X-24 comes up the road toward th carrying Laura. Beside him, Pierce and the Reaver Driver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (starting up the vehicle) I'll pick em up -- meet em halfway. Let the clean up crew in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice's eyes are glued on X-24: his project's first road t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him come to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In back, Caliban lies on the corrugated steel floor, beat and bruised. He rises, peering through a slot. He sees:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan emerging from the front door, Charles in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caliban blinks back tears, overcome with guilt, sorrow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice watches eagerly as Bad Logan nears their truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We learned the hard way with the X-23's. We assumed, because they were children, their emotional responses could be manipulated. But you can't nurture rage. You must simply design it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like God did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce spots a SECOND SET OF HEADLIGHTS coming from the o direction, the high-beams bearing down on X-24.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the fuck is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Logan now pauses, torn between competing headlights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will Munson!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A broken-nosed JACKSON AND FOUR MEN jump out of his truck

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan gently lays Charles in the back of the pick up. He tries to wrap him tighter in the quilt, pulls out his key

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to keep this around you. Charles. Listen, you need--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles' eyes find Logan. He mutters something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the bg., distant YELLING --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Munson, goddammit! Come out here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson and his men come up the road, armed, pissed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come out here now, Munson!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of the men direct Jackson's attention to Bad Logan standing there, staring at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Hello, asshole. Look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice and Pierce react as Bad Logan reverses direction, mo toward Jackson, leaving Laura in the middle of the road. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. No, no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Logan keeps walking toward Jackson and his men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what Munson's paying you, but I'm willing to let bygones be bygones. We could start you at 5G. A week that is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He keeps walking. They cock their weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You best stop where you are, pal. We're the law out here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson fires a blast into X-24's chest but he keeps comi toward him -- SNIKT! -- claws emerging--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What in high holy--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson never completes the thought. X-24 DECAPITATES HIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACKSON'S MEN REACT IN HORROR, start to run, but he's on like a sprung beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DR. RICE, PIERCE and THE REAVERS are fixated on what is happening but THE CAMERA FINDS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CALIBAN, curled in a ball in the back, darkness in his ey as he watches -- LOGAN at his truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's confused. We need to intervene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the one he listens to, Doc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles' finger taps the pick up bed. Logan leans close t hear him say with a trace of a smile...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...our boat... ...our Eden...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles tenderly touches Logan ...and then he passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan stares at Charles. Gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear the SHOUTS from Jackson's men as they fall, one b one. Only now does the sound of world seem to seep back i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan dimly aware of the blood-curdling SCREAMS... He pul the blanket over Charles, his eyes filling with rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She watches, immobilized as -- over at the Alkali Truck -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Rice, who's seen enough, THROWS OPEN THE DOOR and jum down, gesturing toward Laura, shouting past to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty Four! Stop! Stop now! Get the girl! Get back here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: slashing the last of Jackson's men, surrounded by corpses turns to see DR. RICE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come! Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A gunshot hits Bad Logan's shoulder. He spins. One of Jackson's men, not quite dead, has managed to crawl to a X-24 crosses, lifts him by the hair and slits his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice turns toward Pierce and the Reavers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go fucking get her!

dialogues.speaker: AS THE TWO REAVERS GRAB WEAPONS, CLATTERING TOWARD THE EX
dialogues.text: they hear a sound. Along with Pierce, they all turn to se

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BOX OF MUNITIONS FALLEN TO THE GROUND, Caliban's long a GRABBING ONE GRENADE AFTER ANOTHER, PULLING PINS and toss them about the cabin. The Reavers lunge for the loose grenades. Caliban pulls a last pin and hold this one, mee eyes with Pierce.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beware the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce dives for the exit as... Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: THE TRUCK IS ENGULFED IN A RAPID SERIES OF EXPLOSIONS...
dialogues.text: Dr. Rice knocked to the ground by the force, tries to get and is driven down by another blast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura reacts, her face glowing orange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAURA'S POV -- She can make out in the chaotic aftermath- Reavers on fire inside the glowing truck, Pierce stumblin from the wreckage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 sees Dr. Rice, on the ground, starts to move to him -- HE IS BLIND-SIDED BY AN ENRAGED LOGAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before X-24 can react, LOGAN JAMS HIS CLAWS INTO X-24'S C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And X-24 just takes the beating, seemingly amused, THEN SUDDENLY DRIVES HIS CLAWS INTO LOGAN'S CHEST and heaves L like a stuck pig over his head, slamming him on a rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN lies there, bleary, his body ravaged. His eyes find

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAURA, as she struggles to get out of her restraints, hea bent an angle, watching (sideways) as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 finishes injecting himself with another booster shot

dialogues.speaker: AND THEN LEAPS AT LOGAN, ABOUT TO SPEAR HIS HEAD WITH BOT
dialogues.text: SETS OF CLAWS when--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN RAISES HIS CLAWS AND, with all his strength, strugg to hold back X-24 PRESSING DOWN, THEIR BLADES INTERLOCKED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 is too much for him. Logan knows he cannot beat this thing, and he rolls from beneath him, X-24's claws speari into the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan stumbles to his feet, X-24 doing the same and as he lunges again, Logan retreats, starting a crooked, delirio line toward -- Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 SPEARS HIS CLAWS INTO LOGAN'S GUT, starts goring him pulling blades upward, when he hears an engine, turns--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AND IS HIT BY WILL'S TRUCK AND CARRIED ON THE GRILL until he's IMPALED ON THE HULKING THRESHER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spattered in blood, Logan watches from the ground as -- Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WILL MUNSON stumbles from the truck, bloodied, crazy-eyed

dialogues.speaker: HE RAISES A SHOTGUN AT THE IMPALED CREATURE --AND FIRES O
dialogues.text: AND OVER-- shotgun hulls dropping.

dialogues.speaker: BOOM
dialogues.text: BOOM! SHOT IN THE CHEST, torso exploding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan crawls away, trying to get a footing. For a moment meets Will Munson's eyes. Filled with bewilderment and ra Blood comes from his mouth and he collapses, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN hobbles to Laura. As he picks her up, he glances to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FRIGHTENED DR. RICE, still lying in the dirt-- and the wounded, charred PIERCE, crawling away from the Alkali tr his cyborg arm blown off.

dialogues.speaker: WE SEE A CRIPPLED BURNT FORM COLLAPSE IN CORN, CALIBAN,
dialogues.text: watching from a cockeyed view, with some satisfaction as-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan throws Laura on the front bench, climbs behind the wheel, starts the engine, jams on the gas.

dialogues.speaker: THE PICK UP TRUCK ROARS OFF STRAIGHT INTO THE CORNFIELD,
dialogues.text: hard, tearing through the stalks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beside Logan, Laura sees Charles dead in the back and bec frantic, pulling at her restraints, screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold still! Stop it! Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan reaches over with one hand and hacks at her manacle he steers with the other. They say nothing more to each other, driving away into the night.

dialogues.speaker: SEVERAL TRUCKS HAVE PULLED UP IN FRONT OF THE MUNSON HOUS
dialogues.text: Men in hazmat take away the bodies of the Munsons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's alright...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DR. RICE opens his MEDICAL KIT and kneels over-- BAD LOGA

dialogues.speaker: HIS BODY HEALING.
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did fine, twenty four. Breathe. You're healing. You did well. You're a newborn by any measure. Just breathe. Your body has work to do. Hemostasis, angiogenesis, epithelialization, stromal cell proliferation -- Here. This will help with the pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes out A SILVER INJECTION GUN WITH A VIAL ATTACHED injects a dose into Bad Logan's neck. Rice touches Bad Lo on the hand and he seems to lean into the touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Laura head north under a sign that reads:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overlooking a small lake. LOGAN finishes covering CHARLES GRAVE. Its physically hard for him to do this. Now he sta there, trying to think of what to say. He looks at--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAURA, on the other side of the grave, a few steps back. takes her sunglasses off. Takes the ear buds out of her e Ready to hear his words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO-- LOGAN. He looks back at the grave, then out at lake. Clears his throat. His eyes are sallow, his skin pa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well. It's got water and... it's...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan just halts. He looks down and sees-- Laura, taking hand in hers, the same way that Kathryn did with Will at farmhouse. She looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --its got water and it's --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unable to contain himself, Logan pulls back his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Fuck this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts away, limping, with the shovel. Only now do we realize just how ravaged Logan's body still is from his battle with X-24. Blood stains everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura stands there, staring as-- Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan stumbles to the equally ravaged pick up truck. He tosses the shovel in back and grunts something at Laura l "come on!" When she doesn't move, he curses and gets in t truck but it won't turn over. He starts cursing again and gets out and pops the hood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dog barks. Laura looks out across the landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Downstream a quarter mile, A MAN crosses from a STATION W with his labrador, pole on his shoulder, tackle box in ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks back down to Logan. He has collapses in front of the car in a heap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan lies, hooked to an IV on a small bed. He coughs and opens his eyes. He is in the examination room of some sor small town walk-in clinic. The place is decorated in a Ro Mountain style. Out the windows, granite peaks. An Old Do stands over him. He has a soulful face, a bolo tie and bi belt buckle. Reminds one of Richard Farnsworth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome back. I was starting to think I was gonna have to tell that nice little girl out in the waiting room that her daddy's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan notices the EKG monitor connected to him. The Docto sits down and smiles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always hoped I would get a chance to meet someone like you. There's so few of you left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Nice to meet you too, Doc, but I need to get on my--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to sit up, but the old doctor puts a hand on him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you need is rest... and treatment. You need to check yourself in somewhere and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --I'm alright. I'm fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You're not. I mean, I know you're different. But that doesn't change the fact that something inside you is poisoning you. You need to check yourself into a hospital and run some tests, find out what it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I know what it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan pulls off the wires and tubes and gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan limps into the waiting area. Laura is sitting there A Nurse looks up as the Doctor emerges, right behind him-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. Mister. If you don't want to go to a hospital, maybe I can--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Doc. Look at me. You seem like a nice man. But you wanna save a life? Save yours. And everyone else's in this place. Let us get on our way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan turns to-- Laura. She meets his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Laura emerge from the Mountain clinic with a bi sign with a red cross on it. Laura leads him, limping to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE FISHERMAN'S STATION WAGON. Yet another commandeered vehicle. She hands him the keys with a lure fob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't just take shit, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens the driver's door and finds a booster seat made bundled cardboard and a box of milkbones. Logan looks at Laura climbing in on the passenger side. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan tosses the booster pile to the back and climbs in, brushing away dog hair. He starts the station wagon, but before pulling out, turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look. I don't know how you got me here,.. but thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: De nada.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares back at her. She stares back at him. Finally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...You can talk?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck?! Why haven't you-- What's all this bullshit been for the last two thousand miles of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But she's already spitting out words in Spanish, fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tu espera que hable con tu cuando no mirarme? Tu espera que hable con tu cuando me insultas y tratar de dejarme atrГЎs!?--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHUT THE FUCK UP!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stops. She stares at Logan a moment, then very slowly accented English begins to recite:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah, Gideon, Rebecca, Delilah and Rictor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura pulls out THE ENVELOPE OF CASH and points to the address and coordinates on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North Dakota.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Por favor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah, Gideon, Rebecca, Delilah and Rictor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Look. This place. Your mom... she read too many... stories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura just ignores him, reaches into her backpack and tak out the comic, opens it.. Shows him an image of the idyll Box Canyon...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know... I saw it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds up another picture from the page he'd read in t bar, another drawing showing "Eden."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. This place does not exist. No exist-o. It's fictional. (jabs the page) Eden does not exist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si, Eden, por favor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I am saying that place is imaginary. It's a fantasy. See that

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (points at cover, authors) --those are the names of the people who made up these stories. Something happened once and these people made it into a big lie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura bursts out with more Spanish--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Le pagaron me llevo a este lugar! ВїPor quГ© no puedes llevarme a este lugar!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, exasperated, rummages through her pack. He sits the too tired to fight, watches as she comes up with a MAP. S points to where they are, and to where they need to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I know. It's a long way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She punches him in the arm. Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. First-- ow. Second, Look at me. I'm fucked up. That's two days driving from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smacks the map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah, Gideon, Rebecca, Delilah and Rictor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop saying those names--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She again punches him in the arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vaminos!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to punch him again. He catches her fist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do. Not. Hit. Me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah, Gideon--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --And stop saying those--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Rebecca, Delilah and Rictor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She won't stop saying the names. A broken record.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay-- ENOUGH. Enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She puts his hand on the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Pierce in a gown, upright on a field hospital bed, hooked to an IV, skin covered with burn salve and gauze. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His stumped arm is exposed, doing its best to help his go hand repair A CYBORG HAND which sits on the overbed. As h glances out a side window, he tosses a screwdriver back t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FLESHY NURSE standing over him, fumbling with a tool bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That ain't a torx, honey. That's a phillips head. I need a torx.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce glances again out the side window -- into the park lot of a rural high school, cordoned off, thick with mili vehicles, issue sedans, a command trailer and dome tents. Outside the trailer, Dr. Rice is getting harangued by a g of MILITARY BRASS and INTEL / CONTRACTOR TYPES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This? Or this. They look the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce snatches the tool he needs from the nurse and in t strokes, fixes his cyborg hand. Wiggles the fingers. Goes immediately to work, grabbing AN EVIDENCE FOLDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside is a collection of documents from the farmhouse, a them, Laura's wrinkled photograph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE PULLS IT CLOSE-- Gabriela and the X-23 kids. And anoth nurse, Maria, the one who sang on birthdays. He turns the photo over to read the scrawl on the back, then sees something else, something that makes his eyes bright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. Responsive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your hand. Its amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the fuck out of here. This shit's classified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Rice enters swiftly from a hallway, pushing through plastic drapes as if hoping to lose the collection of government types who follow him into this tented gymnasiu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and we understand the importance of containment, Dr Rice. But we are in the continental United States.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Yes we are, and I terminated your goddam mutant most wanted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We appreciate that but you can't just leave a war zone behind like you, like you did in Juarez. We--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Major and his companions suddenly realize they are mo through a makeshift morgue. TWO DOZEN BODIES laid out as haz mat team tags them. The bodies are mostly children, slightly off looking mutants. A few we might recognize fr Gabriela's video. Also among them, Will, Kathryn, and Nat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd appreciate it, Major, if your associates would stop staring at the dead assets. Try to remind yourselves these were all little killing machines, machines who would have happily disemboweled your family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (spins, livid) I was told you want these assets off board, dead or alive. Are you changing my brief?! Are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people stop walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Good bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice heads for a side door, pausing by another table wher the BURNED CORPSE OF CALIBAN lies curled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save tissue from this one. He was a good tracker and had a high IQ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice walks out of the school building, blows past an MP a the fleshy nurse, crossing into the infirmary tent. He fi Pierce getting dressed, pulling the IV, grabbing a crutch Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce hands Rice -- THE WRINKLED PHOTOGRAPH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at that. Was found at the farmhouse. I know. It's her. But look at the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice turns it to reveal-- The coordinates in North Dakota

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those are the coordinates of a fire road in the Badlands. A reservation near the Border. And, according to Wikipedia, its also this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands a tablet with the "EDEN EXODUS" X-MEN COMIC cued the screen. Rice regards it skeptically. Thousands of mut in Exodus, headed for the Badlands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gaby loved that shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MEXICAN WOMAN looks up in terror as a door unlocks. She looks familiar, despite the bruises and blood. An armed g looks up from a show on his phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Maria.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now we recognize the name and face: Maria, the other nurse in Gabriela's video.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I understand that your mother and son are safe at the holding center in Guadalupe. We're looking after them both of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maria is sickened by the notion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wh-what more do you want from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice takes out the tablet containing the X-Men comic. Her blanching expression immediately betrays her: she knows t place, knows what it means...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connect the fucking dots, dear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up at him, gripped by fear. Rice just smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the station wagon moves along winding road through the mountains. It starts to drift off the road...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan at the wheel. Laura shoves him and he wakes up, swe back off the shoulder. She nods to the wheel, speaks Span

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Absolutely not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's barely awake. Barely alive, it seems. He's bruised a broken. Blood runs from his sleeve from some unseen cut o cuts on his arm. He turns to see Laura still looking his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quit looking at me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No comprende.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan turns to her. Looks away. To weary to say anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to die. (off Logan's look) Charles told me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What else did he tell you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To not let you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs the wheel, pulls to the right, taking them onto shoulder. Logan tries to fight it but can't. Hits the bra Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits the brakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan turns the car off, glares at her, closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As night falls, Laura watches the deeply sleeping Logan. a sign she reaches over to him and starts to pull his bod the passenger side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE CUT OUTSIDE and watch Laura finish hauling Logan over the shotgun seat. Then she walks around the station wagon gets in the other side-- and lays rubber down the highway

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON -- LOGAN, who wakes with a start. Things are all crooked. He is alone in the station wagon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stumbles out the door to see that the front end of the is nose down in a swale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shuffles, weak and woozy, following a path in the dirt and then he sights--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura about a hundred yards ahead of him, hiking up a ris Her eyes find his.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come! Come!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She whistles loudly. A covey of birds fly out of the brus Laura smiles for the first time. It is beautiful. Logan stumbles forward, follows her into a clearing which revea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks about, overwhelmed by the nature and, of cour the similarity to the "Eden" pictured in the comic book. takes a few steps toward Laura but his legs start to give underneath him and he falls to the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: BLACK.
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he is jerked into frame. He stares upward, face in the sun, gently rocking to and fro. He is tied to a board a hundred feet in the air above the Box Canyon. He is being hauled up by who knows what.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Logan's conveyance arrives at the top, he sees that th people who have hauled him up are kids, about ten of them some older, some younger than Laura, all looking down at like they caught the biggest fish ever. They are all muta children who have natural anomalies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Among them, an African American boy, BOBBY, 10, (who clin to an armful of X-MEN ACTION FIGURES), a dirty blonde gir REBECCA, 12, A dark-eyed goth-type, DELILAH, LIZARD BOY, RICTOR, 14, a natural leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A faded sign on the nearby building reads "CAMP ANOLJEET" ("we serve' in native American). The doors have condemned signs on them. It is a run down version of the building pictured in the comic book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dizzy and weak, Logan stares at them, his eyes rolling up his head as we go to -- BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flicker of light. Logan's eyes blink open, he's on a be now, body weak, eyes heavy. He sees THE KIDS. Some of the sleeping, or reading or busy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few of them tend to Logan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the kids (DELILAH) brings a wet cloth for Logan, b before handing it to him, she holds it under her breath, freezing it into an ice pack for his battered ribs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this good, Rictor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor oversees Lizard Boy, drawing a few drops of green fluid from a vial into a syringe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so much. Less.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan squints at the bottle. Grabs it. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get this?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of the children step back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where we come from.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They gave it to us when we fight. It makes you stronger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It makes you crazy is what it does. It'll kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not in small doses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's helping you heal, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (trying to sit up) Where's Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's asleep. Do you want me to wake her up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan lies back, closes his eyes as we cut to BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan wakes with a start, screaming. There is only one ch tending him. It is LAURA. She sits on a chair beside him, watching him. He meets her eyes, disoriented, shaken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pesadillas. ...you had night-mare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan just looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have nightmares?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...People hurt me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine are different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Por que?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hurt people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura takes this in. Then pulls something from her pocket Logan's Adamantium bullet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan nods, tries to sit up. In pain. She hands it to him He rolls it in his fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's made of Adamantium. Same thing they put inside us. That's why it can kill us. Probably killing me now. Anyway, I got that a long time ago. Kept it as a reminder of what I am. Now I keep it to-- (looks at her plainly) Actually, I was thinking about shooting myself with it. Like Charles said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura's smile fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've hurt people too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna have to learn how to live with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were bad people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan closes his eyes. The bullet sits in his open palm. Laura takes it.

dialogues.speaker: BLACK.
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan awakes to hear children playing outside. He watches some of the kids play a simple game of soccer. Suddenly o of the girls wiffs and kicks right past a ball and then continues prancing, her legs kicking high, arms waving li puppet. Some of the boys laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah! Stop! STOP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan sees little Jonah manipulating the girl like a puppeteer. Everything he does, kicking out his legs, wavi his arms, she is somehow forced to do, a mirror image. So of the other kids come to her defense --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonah, let go! Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It all ends suddenly when Rictor steps up behind Jonah an slaps him upside the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut the shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another kid kicks the loose ball off the edge of the clif and REBECCA, runs right off the edge of the cliff to catc the ball, then returns, walking on air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan lies back in bed. Weak. But looking better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From across the darkened room, Bobby walks up to Logan. L considers him a moment. Bobby holds up an action figures, vintage toy, the paint chipped. As if expecting a reactio from him. It's a Wolverine figure, then he holds up anoth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Was Sabretooth real?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura said you said all the stories in the comic books were lies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not all. Not completely. Sabretooth was real. He was in a program with me. Like what they did to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you did mean things with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But now you're doing good things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks at the kid a moment, then--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid, I don't know what I'm doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of snipping. Giggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we see nearly all the kids standing around Logan's c with glowing grins on their faces. Laura among them, alth she slides into the back of the pack as he sits up. BOBBY REBECCA hide scissors behind their backs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now we see why. They have cut Logan's beard. Strike t They have shaped Logan's beard into mutton chops. They ha snipped off his moustache and soul patch. He touches his face, guessing what they've done-- and crosses, limping t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TO A MIRROR. They all squeal in joy as he takes in his reflection. Then he glares at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not funny. Not funny at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor suddenly hurries through the space, moving from on room to the next. Logan moves after him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, pal, how long have I been out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Rictor is already moving off outside--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan hobbles after Rictor, who passes Jonah, packing a backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long have I been in that bed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been sitting here two days? You can't do that. You can't just stay here forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We aren't. We had to wait. It was the plan. Everyone had `til today to find their way here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if you keep waiting those assholes will find you. And kill you all. You need to get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (checking a bag) What do you think we're doing, asshole? We're leaving tomorrow at dawn. We're going to cross the border.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Canada?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan finds Laura and the other mutant children packing u belongings. The older ones lead younger ones-- loading gu stocking ammo, prepared for anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor is hunched over a short wave radio. There are voic In French. He clicks off, crosses to the railing, address the others like an adolescent general:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was the signal. They're ready for us on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone doubles their efforts. Logan joins Laura at an O MOUNTED TELESCOPE. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a ten mile hike through the woods, and then, see that pass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura nods, eye pressed to the viewfinder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks out at a distant, rugged mountain looms beyon swath of dense forest. There is a crevasse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through there. That's the border. That's where we can be free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor now turns to Logan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan notices Laura watching him tentatively. As if gaugi how he's going to react to something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Rictor takes Logan by the arm and guides him, still limping, to a closet --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura told me all you did for her. She was lucky to have you. Not everyone was so lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan glances back at Laura, still watching him carefully

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor opens a cupboard and hands Logan what is left of t old envelope of cash. Logan stares down at the money --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it. For your supplies or whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She says it's yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan pushes the cash back in Rictor's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Well. Look. I don't need this. You do. For supplies. Buy her some cereal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor regards him a moment, nods solemnly and exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, the kids all sit before a fire, perched on their rucksacks, eating from cans of food. Eager to make the tr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside, Logan ties his boots sitting on the cot, observin them with a hint of nostalgia -- the chatty camaraderie, of the kids goofing with their powers, laughter-- it tugs unexpectedly at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then he notices LAURA staring at him. A little hard, little cryptic. Logan turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They seem nice. Your friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda remind me--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura abruptly rises and marches off. Logan thrown --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is about to go outside -- when Logan GRABS her arm and tu her to his bunk area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She ignores him, yanking her arm free --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. I asked you a question. What are you pissed about? You're with your friends. You made it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And where will you go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan considers this a moment, smiles--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nearest bar, for starters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura absorbs the answer, starts to exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What-- you thought I was coming along?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glares back at him-- clearly, yes. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was never the deal. I got you this far, that's all I signed up for. I gave back the money --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such a nice man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I never asked for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts to move off again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I don't know what Charles put in your head, but I'm not... whatever it is you think I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks off, defiant, hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't need me. You've got Rictor, Delilah, Rebecca, Bobby, blah blah whoever. Hey. It's better this way. I suck at this. Bad shit happens to people I care about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura meets his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I will be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And she walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LOGAN, watching her go. Resisting every urge to chase after her-- he SLAMS the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LAURA OUTSIDE, at the edge of the cliff, looking out a the stars as she wipes her eyes, the faint laughter and n of the kids nearby. She glances back at Logan's door... t turns to join them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan asleep in his corner. He stirs awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees something near his face. A hypodermic and one las vial of the green fluid on top of a backpack. Beside it, note: "NOT ALL AT ONCE. - RICTOR"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan ventures out by first light. It's eerily quiet here now. All the kids are indeed gone. Laura too. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan continues walking through the now-abandoned structu reckoning with the choice he made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan is looking down at his station wagon still parked i the swale -- when he halts. Hears a buzzing, then looks upward and sees --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flock of drones flying by overhead, fanning out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan bursts in, hurries to-- THE TELESCOPE -- the one th Rictor had Laura peer through yesterday. Logan brings his to the viewfinder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN'S POV THROUGH TELESCOPE: the same distant mountain crevasse that Laura had seen, five miles away, looming li beacon, haloed violet by the rising sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan breathes, at once relieved and regretful. About to away -- when he swings the telescope and sees --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN'S POV THROUGH TELESCOPE: something is moving toward base of the mountain... black objects, rustling trees... Logan adjusts focus and sees--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan drops back from the telescope--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN GRABS that vial of green fluid and the needle. Thro them in the backpack, eyes fixed in alarm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan bounding through the woods... but he is already out breath... stumbling...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up ahead he starts to hear the echoed cracks of GUNFIRE, children crying out, shrieking--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan falls to the ground. Gasping, coughing, his wounds starting to reopen. About to lose consciousness, he reach into the backpack, fumbling with the syringe and the vial Draws everything in the container and injects himself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan's eyes go wide as the drug hits his bloodstream. He screams. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a free-for-all as the Reavers descend on their prey the kids fleeing in all directions, desperately trying to find cover in the maze of trees, bullets spraying, among those running for their lives, Laura --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZARD BOY disappears like a chameleon into the bark of a tree to avoid a chasing Reaver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once the Reaver passes, Lizard Boy steps out from the tre thinking he is safe, and turns to find Pierce standing th He fires his side arm into the boy's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard boy drops to the ground and Pierce leaves his body be dragged away by Reavers behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DR. RICE rides in a jeep with two soldiers. He watches th battle ahead from a safe distance. Behind him lumbers the Alkali Control Vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move faster. We can't let them get to the border.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELLA is cornered by several soldiers, who advance on her. Her eyes roll up in her head as she draws on her powers a

dialogues.speaker: PINE NEEDLES LIFT FROM THE GROUND AND TEAR FROM THE TREES
dialogues.text: swirling into a whirlwind. The needles envelope the soldi in a vortex, blinding them, stabbing them, shredding thei skin, filling their mouthes, gagging them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SOLDIER GRABS ELLA from behind, covering her eyes. The needles fall to the ground. As he proceeds to shackle her wrists-- LAURA LEAPS UPON HIM, SPEARING HIM WITH HER CLAW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura and Ella run away as other soldiers fire upon them. Laura tries to pull her friend, she is not fast enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella! Run faster! Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura takes a shot to the leg, stumbling, healing, limpin but still moving. She looks back to see -- Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella has been hit and is face down in the leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She crosses back to Ella to find her dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soldiers converging, Laura flees toward other children up ahead. Some soldiers turn as they hear -- gunfire and men screams from behind them --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN SPRINTS THROUGH THE TREES. Speeding. Full strength. We have never seen him before like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is Weapon X in a full berserker rage. His body restore the huge dose of the drug, he cuts his way through Reaver and Soldiers one after another like a saw blade. They fir him but it doesn't matter, he heals instantly. Each of th are gored and slashed and killed as Logan races toward th children up ahead, overtaking the Alkali convoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON -- LITTLE BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: running in terror as he's pursued by THREE REAVERS, their bullets chewing up the trees around him, gaining on him--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- when he finally stumbles, peers up to see those Reaver closing in on him, restraints and weapons at the ready wh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --SNIKT! Logan appears from nowhere and kills them in an instant. A guerilla warrior, dropped back in the jungle f one last battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELSEWHERE IN THE WOODS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAH uses his ocular mirror connection, making one of th Reavers AIM HIS GUN AT HIS OWN MEN, MOWING THEM DOWN. The mimes his "puppet" Reaver into aiming his automatic rifle himself, shooting himself in the chin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON -- DELILAH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delilah is caught against a tree. She breathes on her captor's arm, FREEZING IT. Then she shatters his frozen l and the soldier screams as more Reavers grab Delilah, restraining her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON -- PIERCE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Reaver brings Logan's backpack to Pierce. He looks at t vial and empty syringe. He signals the troops to keep mov Concerned, he looks ahead to the convoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he comes upon Ella, dead in the leaves. He pauses, see a trail of blood leading off and away. Sniffs it. Laura..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Logan sees PIERCE THROUGH THE TREES. Dr. Rice behind in the jeep at the head of the convoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce meets Logan's eyes as Logan starts toward him. Pierce also sees--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan is blown backward off his feet. Sprayed with shrapn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy continues moving after the children in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan pulls himself up from the smoldering brush to see -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAURA up ahead, cornered by Reavers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She snarls and slashes at their rifles. But then she hear primal scream and looks up to see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN, sprinting toward her, eyes aflame. He slaughters t men surrounding Laura in a swirl of blood--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then the father and daughter move on, chasing after t convoy, slashing through several more Reavers emerging fr the woods to ambush them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the end of this father daughter blade Logan stumbles, of breath, motioning for Laura to move on, as she slashes one more Reaver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura! Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura obeys, starts to run, but looks back at --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan, still panting for air. His fresh wounds not healin fast anymore. Laura knows what he's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You took all the medicine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks to his wounds, then to Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...It's wearing off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN TAKES THE DEAD REAVER'S SIDEARM, stuffs it in his b and leads Laura toward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CHILDREN run in a pack toward the mountains as fast a they can go. RICTOR at the rear, exhorts them in Spanish go faster. He turns back to see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ALKALI CONVOY GAINING ON THEM. Rictor doubles his pac trying to catch up to the children when-- BAM! -- HE IS S IN THE SHOULDER and falls to the ground, hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looping a restraint around the boy's neck just as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura and Logan come to a stop at the edge of the clearin Pale and weak, Logan looks to Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to your friends, Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura takes a step but turns back as Logan adds--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...You'll know when.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Laura moves off, Logan stumbles forward placing himsel Pierce's path to the jeeps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura moves surreptitiously through the woods to gain bet position on her captive friends. She eyes the two Reavers stand on a jeep, watching over the children-- and two oth Reavers standing watch nearby. Her eyes then land on--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donald Pierce as he throws a bleeding Richter to his knee gun to the back of the boy's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura looks to-- Logan, clutching for air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Green juice is wearing down, huh? For an ol' mute, that a short high. Gonna be hard to keep those claws out soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thrashing, to Logan) Waste this dick, Logan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce knocks Rictor unconscious with the butt of his gun then aims the muzzle at Rictor's head. He looks back up a Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan, weak, standing there. Dr. Rice steps up behind Pie

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please stop, Mr. Howlett, or I am going to have to tell these men to fire on these children. You can see the effects of the serum are wearing off. You will not survive any further wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan glares at Rice, glances at Laura as she encircles t remaining Reavers guarding her friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an honor to meet you. I'm Zander Rice. I believe you knew my father on the Weapon X program.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan's dark look goes darker. He holds up his bloody cla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's the asshole who put this poison in me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes he was. One of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I might have killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you're right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit. Show some respect, mutey. You're lookin' at the man who wiped out your kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friend Donald overstates. The goal was not ending mutant-kind but controlling it. I realized we needn't stop perfecting what we eat and drink when we could use those products to perfect ourselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura sneaks closer to two of the Reavers, poised to atta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To distribute gene therapy discreetly, through, well, everything -- from sweet drinks to breakfast cereal. And it worked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Random mutancy went the way of polio. And we embarked on our next endeavor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan's eyes drift from Pierce to Rice to Laura, claws ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Growing mutants of your own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dangerous times, James. We can't trust fate to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lifts his pistol AND SHOOTS ZANDER RICE IN THE HEAD. T Doctor falls back, dead, in the grass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Reavers lunge for their weapons but Laura surprises t slitting their throats as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOGAN SHOOTS AGAIN, BLOWING OFF PIERCE'S CYBORG HAND-- an is about to shoot a kill-shot on Pierce but the pistol clicks, its chamber empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce turns and runs towards the Alkali control truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan stumbles after him, claws out now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce grabs hold of the control van door, throws it open

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's showtime, boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is X24 and he slashes at Logan mercilessly. The fight between them is bloody and feral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura watches, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan struggles to stay on his feet, but there is fear in eyes. He doesn't know if he can hold his own against this younger stronger version of himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The commotion distracts the two Reavers guarding the chil who raise their weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A THIRD REAVER lines up a shot, putting Logan in his cros hairs, when he is suddenly taken out by Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sensing their attention is elsewhere, young Bobby shifts weight, extending his finger, eyes rolling in his head as Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN ELECTRICAL BOLT ARCS OFF HIS FINGER leaping to the jee ELECTROCUTING THE TWO REAVER GUARDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura turns back as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 GRABS LOGAN AND TOSSES HIM LIKE A RAG DOLL into open door of the control van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bleary, Logan grabs the fallen door, summons his remainin strength and smashes X24 with it, knocking the monster to dirt. Logan reaches deep, bringing the iron door down lik guillotine on X-24's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor come to consciousness in the grass, his eyes findi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X24, pinned on the ground, struggling to breathe, the van door pressing against his neck. X24 catches sight of Dr. Rice, his fallen master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce watches, his survival riding on X24's ability to g up and defeat Logan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up! Get up, boy! That's right! He killed your Daddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X24 howls in rage and breaks Logan's hold, leaping at Log mauling him and hurling his limp, bloody body beyond the jeeps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satisfied with himself, X24 is shocked when--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura! No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAURA LEAPS ON X24'S BACK and slashes at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan tries to crawl back to Laura to help her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce grabs a crossbow from the van and aims it at Logan fires, harpooning Logan's leg. He howls in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pierce ties off the harpoon able and tosses the crossbow flees to his jeep, looking to escape but suddenly he is cornered by --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE NEWLY FREED MUTANT CHILDREN COMING AT HIM, each enrag aiming their fledgling mutant powers at him. They form a circle, trapping him, freezing him, entangling him, shock him and burning him, all at once. Pierce cries in agony. have no mercy for their lifelong oppressor. Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bloodied and cut, X24 manages to get a hold of Laura -- h hurls her off his back into a tree... hard. She lies ther limp at the base of the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X24 crosses to Logan, weakened, depleted, preparing to ki his elder, when suddenly--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor extends his hands and with all his energy projects power to the ground beneath the Control Van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura regains consciousness, noticing the empty pistol a feet away from her in the grass. Then she sees--

dialogues.speaker: THE ROCK AND EARTH BENEATH THE CONTROL VAN START TO HEAVE
dialogues.text: UPWARD and LIFT THE CONTROL VAN into the air...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rictor screams as the power of his mutancy ripples throug him and with one last push --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He releases the rocks beneath the van--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, the children stare at Pierce. He lies dead at their feet, mummified in ice, blood and twisted grass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan gets to his feet and reaches out for Laura.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura. You need to get out. (to the other children) All of you. Get out of here! Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the is a metallic CREAK AND KLUNK AND X24 EMERG BLOODIED, FROM BENEATH THE TOPPLED VAN. The children scre as the monster makes a run at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the children) Go, go GO! Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The children comply, Laura most hesitant as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan stumbles to position himself between the children a the unstoppable fully healed creature charging at him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-24 GORES LOGAN WITH BOTH HIS CLAWS and, using them like grappling hooks, drags Logan off to the forest's edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X24 heaves Logan onto a fallen stump, A JAGGED WOOD LIMB SPEARING THROUGH LOGAN'S TORSO. Logan howls in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura runs to the pistol in the grass. Pulls the Adamanti bullet from her pocket, fumbling to load the gun as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delirious, losing blood, LOGAN grabs helplessly at X24's claws (already plunged into him) as the monster jams them deeper, through him, and into the log-- then raises them one last goring when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X24's Adamantium skull suddenly explodes. He collapses to ground. Done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura stands ten feet away, holding the smoking pistol. H eyes meet Logan's and she drops the gun and runs to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hacks Logan from the tree stump. Logan slides painful to the forest floor. He struggles to breathe. His body is decimated, his skeleton showing through his wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura's eyes are wild and fearful. She can see he is mort wounded... She kneels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: no, no, no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Take your friends and run. Go. Listen to me, Laura. Run. They'll just keep coming and coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Don't be what they made you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other mutant children emerge from the woods. Stand quietly at a distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan watches them all, his eyes glassy, his body still. Laura takes Logan's bloody hand, and this time, he holds

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...it's okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... ...daddy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks at her. Then stiffens. Takes a short breath.. And in his eyes, there is a flicker of wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this is what it feels like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Final Shooting - 8/23/2016

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then his breath releases and he is very still.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laura squeezes his limp hand. Disbelieving that he has passed. But there is nothing left in him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still holding his hand, Laura looks up at her friends, te in her eyes. The other children gather closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER ON -- ALL THE CHILDREN IN A CIRCLE AROUND LOGAN. Th just stand there in the blast-radius of the carnage as th sun drifts lower in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man has to be what he is, Joey. You can't break the mould.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The young mutants lower Logan into the ground. BOBBY has a simple wooden cross for Logan's grave. Laura stares unrelenting at Logan as the dirt covers him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no living with a killing. There's no going back. Right or wrong, it's a brand. A brand that sticks. Now run on home to your mother, and tell her everything's alright. There's no more guns in the valley...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The children all look to Rictor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The children all grab their backpacks and start on the mountain trail to Canada.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Laura hesitates, still looking at Logan's grave. She not move, but then, tearful, grabs her own backpack. As s passes Logan's makeshift cross, she looks at it a moment, considering, then kneels and tips it on its side to make

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera moves in on the X as in the distance, Laura jo her friends scaling the dark mountains, moving toward the future.
